name: Young Light Dragon
description: The Young Light Dragon is known for its celestial powers, shining bright light in a 30-foot area, and having the ability to glide effortlessly through space.
memorable: Its ability to unleash radiant damage and dazzle enemies with blinding light makes it a unique and formidable foe.
goals: Typically seeks to protect the weak and combat undead forces.
relations: May be encountered alongside other celestial beings or dragons.
environment: Can often be found in celestial realms or among the stars.
strengths: Immunity to radiant damage and resilience against non-magical attacks.
weaknesses: Average Dexterity makes it less agile in combat.
attacks: Can bite with a powerful melee attack and unleash devastating breath weapons.
most_powerful_ability: Radiant Breath dealing significant area damage to multiple foes.
senses: Has blindsight out to 30 feet, allowing it to perceive its environment without relying on sight.
skills: Exceptional perception skills enhance its awareness in battle.
additional_information: Sheds bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet.
Can move through objects and creatures as difficult terrain with Incorporeal Movement.
Travels through the void without needing air, food, or sleep.
Breath weapons can blind foes or destroy weaker undead instantly.
High Constitution and Strength scores enhance its durability and melee capability.
